item.description:
The first book we'll read is Brick Lane by British-Bangladeshi writer Monica Ali.

Please note that the meetup location may change if a lot of people RSVP. To get to this Starbucks by T, take the green line C to Washington Square in Brookline (closest and most convenient T stop) or take the green line D to Beaconsfield and walk to Beacon Street (it's a short ~5 minute walk from Beaconsfield to the meetup point).
item.name: Reading books by international writers January Meetup
